description:
Easily update maps and software, sync with Garmin Connect™ and register your device.

Use Garmin Express to update maps and software, sync with Garmin Connect and register your device. This desktop software notifies you when updates are available and helps you install them.

Keep Your Device up to Date:
* Get the latest detailed street maps to ensure fast, accurate navigation.
* Use Garmin Express to upload your activities and wellness data to your Garmin Connect account.
* Garmin Express makes software updates easy to install.
* Manage free and paid content, including Connect IQ™ Store apps and accessory maps.
* Download the latest charts to a memory card for easy transfer to your marine device.
* Get the latest free CourseView maps and updates for your Garmin golf device.
* Activate your maps or services with a voucher or product key.
